items.text: A Song of degrees of David.
items.plainText: A Song of degrees of David.

items.text: Behold, how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity!
items.plainText: Behold, how good and how pleasant it is for brethren to dwell together in unity!

items.text: It is like the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, even Aaron's beard: that went down to the skirts of his garments;
items.plainText: It is like the precious ointment upon the head, that ran down upon the beard, even Aaron's beard: that went down to the skirts of his garments;

items.text: As the dew of Hermon, and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the LORD commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.
items.plainText: As the dew of Hermon, and as the dew that descended upon the mountains of Zion: for there the LORD commanded the blessing, even life for evermore.
